original_title: 伝説の巨獣狼男対ゴジラ
overview: A high production fan film directed and produced by Shizuo Nakajima and several former Toho filmmakers in 1983. Principal photography on Wolfman vs. Godzilla began in 1983 and concluded in the mid 1980's. Post-production ("editing, sound design, and visual effects") is ongoing.
title: Wolfman vs. Godzilla
